msgSnippet: (1) Either redesign the code to be easier to test or make the test class an inner class of the thread class. (2) Though it won t help you create fake tables,

(1) Either redesign the code to be easier to test or make the test class an
inner class of the thread class.

(2) Though it won't help you create fake tables, you could use Dbunit
(dbunit.sf.net) to test your code.  Or you might be able to use Mock Objects
(http://www.mockobjects.com)  to create fake tables.

Mike Bresnahan
subject: Re: Beginner's Question
